name: frontend
description: The native iOS frontend for Homi, built with SwiftUI and SceneKit for high-performance 3D room design and visualization.

scripts.ios: xcodebuild -project Homi/Homi.xcodeproj -scheme Homi -sdk iphonesimulator -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 17 Pro Max' && xcrun simctl install booted ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/*/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/Homi.app && xcrun simctl launch booted com.phongtang.Homi
